group_1.narration: ーMeguruー@Thank you to pen name "Bike towards your dreams!"@who bravely sent in listener mail!
ーMeguruー@Meguru is also working hard to reach her dreams,@so I reeeally understand how you feel.
ーMeguruー@"Bike toward your dreams!" is aiming to be a competitive keirin cyclist@and Meguru is aiming to be a world-famous MC,@so let's do our utmost to fight for our dreams!
ーMeguruー@ ...Ohh, it looks like that's all the time we have for today.
ーMeguruー@We received a lot of listener mail this week too!@Thank you everyone!
ーMeguruー@There was so much mail Meguru couldn't read all of them on-air.@I'm super-duper-whooping grateful...!
ーMeguruー@And that's all for today's lunch broadcast,@brought to you by Meguru Hibiki!
ーMeguruー@See you next week!@Goodbye, everyone!

group_1.textRight: Good work, Meguru! Today's broadcast was as good @as usual.
We've gained new members and now have @broadcasts during the lunch break.
Seriously Meguru, it's thanks to your talent@that the club was saved.
I'll see you next week, okay?

group_1.textLeft: Yup~ Thanks for your hard work.

group_1.textCenter: Aaah~ That's all for this Wednesday...
(I can't wait for next week when I get to be in charge again~.)
(Oh, I've gotta think about the main topic for my broadcasts next month...!)

group_1.textRight: Seems like things are going well.

group_1.textLeft: It's true though, I'm making so much progress@on my dream it's scary!
Aah~ I can't wait to become an amazingly popular @MC!

group_1.textRight: Why are you so fixated on becoming a popular MC?

group_1.textLeft: Meguru has always been so unremarkable...

group_1.narration: "Entertainers, athletes, scientists, artists...@I’ve always admired amazing people,@and so I tried studying hard and exercising.@But for all my effort, I got nothing in return.@It was still always faster to get to my scores@by counting from the bottom..."
"Meguru has no chance of being an amazing person..."
"So in order to still be able to be with@these amazing people, Meguru decided to become an MC,@that way I can at least talk to@all the incredible people in the world...!

"And that was when I started practicing and practicing@for hours every day, I even ran to become@the school‘s announcer, but I didn't have the talent...@I'd be so nervous I couldn't talk,@I just wasn't cut out for it..."
"After joining the broadcasting club in high school,@I was determined to practice more@and become a popular MC for sure!"

group_1.textLeft: Well, now that I've made the wish,@I'll definitely become a popular MC.
If all goes well, I'll meet amazing celebrities@in no time...!
Oh, but there was an easier way.
I could just have Kyubey grant me another wish!
Heeey, can you let Meguru meet a famous celebrity @right now!?

group_1.textRight: As I said when we first met,@I can only grant one wish for you.

group_1.textLeft: Meguru’s suffered a huge shock and reels from the revelation...
...Just kidding. Well if that's how it is, then so be it!
Sooner or later, Meguru really will become someone who can meet and talk to those amazing people...
Meguru has a favorite catch phrase@that will become so famous,
it'll be heard around the world!

group_1.textCenter: Let your heart ring out!@And tour the world Meguru Hibiki!
